text: Donkey Kong Land is a video game released for the Game Boy system in 1995. It is a semi-sequel to Donkey Kong Country as it takes place after Donkey Kong Country, but yet is part of a different portion of the Donkey Kong series. Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong are once again the playable characters in the game. title: Donkey Kong Land
